DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effectiveness acupuncture treatment Bipolar Depression .
DOC.detailed_description: Patients receive 8 week ( 12 session ) acupuncture treatment plus stable medication . Patients randomly assign receive either acupuncture design relieve symptom depression acupuncture design relieve legitimate physical condition . A comparison group patient take medication receive acupuncture assess evaluate effectiveness medication alone . Patients participate clinical assessment week , include visit psychiatrist complete symptom rating scale .
DOC.criteria: Meet DSMIV criterion bipolar I disorder bipolar II disorder Demonstrate symptom depression determine minimum score 25 Inventory Depressive SymptomsClinician Rated Scale Have take stable psychoactive medication least 30 day prior study entry
